Class SimpleArray<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimpleArray<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Array<T>

    public class SimpleArray<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Array<T>
    Creates simplearray objects: essentially java arrays that implement the array interface
